If you go to Bandung for a vacation while still want to keep it on budget, I think this hotel is the right choice for you. It offers nice and comfy rooms with affordable price. Not to mention that this hotel is located near a lot of tourist spot. In fact, the hotel is connected to the mall beside it. So you can easily play and enjoy the mall effortlessly. There is swimming pool too. They have live music in the lobby at night. You can listen to the music while lounging there. The room is not so big, but enough for two (three with a child). Tea and coffee are provided in the room, though it's not a lot. There is a big TV with international channel and a mini fridge. In the bathroom, there's also hairdryer, soap, shampoo etc. that you can use. The view was nice, but from my room that time it was not so great. For the most part, the room is clean. However, if you take a really close look you might find some miniscule dirt somewhere. The only problem I had when I stayed here was the key card. It was a bit difficult to open the door and I wasn't sure why. If you have this kind of trouble, please contact the staffs in the lobby. They will help you.
